description: Pariah is a Bengali-language by Vikran Chatterjee that means ‘Every street dog has a name'. The film starts with deep-rooted emotions and conflicts. There is a fragile balance between ambition and the relationship. It is about the emotions of a man who lost his puppy, which he found when he was straying in the streets. He goes missing, then the picture takes several turns. It was released in theatres on February 9, 2024 and is now setting its paws on the OTT soon.
title: Pariah OTT Release: Vikram Chatterjee’s Heart-Wrenching Stray Dog Thriller Set for OTT Debut

description: A new analysis of Apollo samples and Earth rocks suggests that a nearby rocky planet, not a distant object, collided with early Earth and formed the moon. The study argues that this lost planet, Theia, originated in the inner solar system and shared Earth’s early neighbourhood, offering fresh insight into one of the most important events in our planet’s history.
title: A Nearby Planet May Have Formed the Moon Following a Collision With Early Earth: Study

description: Pranav Mohanlal’s Dies Irae is a high-stakes horror thriller that combines mystery, supernatural elements, and strong performances. Directed by Rahul Sadasivan, the film streams on JioHotstar from December 5, 2025, and is rated 7.2/10 on IMDb, making it a must-watch for fans of Malayalam horror and supernatural suspense.
title: Dies Irae OTT Release: When, Where to Watch Pranav Mohanlal's Malayalam Horror Thriller Online

description: Dulquer Salmaan's latest piece of art, in the form of Kaantha drama, is drawing the attention of audiences since its theatrical release. It was released in theatres on November 14, 2025, and the film has gained many praises since then. It has a gripping narrative with a compelling storyline from a 1950s setup. This movie marks a Tamil industry debut of Bhagyashri Borse. After its theatrical run, Kaantha is set to hit OTT platforms soon.
title: Dulquer Salmaan’s Kaantha Set for OTT Debut: When and Where to Watch 1950's Period Drama Online?

description: If you want hassle-free earphones that look premium, deliver a polished experience and balanced sound, and work well with Gemini (and if you have smaller ears), you will find a lot of value in the Google Pixel Buds 2a. If you own a Pixel phone and the Buds Pro 2 is out of budget, these offer many of the same strengths at a lower price.
title: Google Pixel Buds 2a Review: New Entry-Level Earbud, But Is It Worth the Price?

description: In December 2025, the ISS reached a historic milestone with eight visiting spacecraft docked simultaneously for the first time. The lineup included Soyuz crew vehicles, Progress cargo ships, Japan’s HTV-X1, Northrop Grumman’s Cygnus, and two SpaceX Dragons. The rare configuration highlighted intense crew rotation operations and the ISS’s role as a global hub for international space cooperation.
title: International Space Station Makes History As Eight Visiting Spacecraft Simultaneously Dock

description: Netflix’s The Abandons, starring Lena Headey and Gillian Anderson, arrives on December 4. Set on the violent 1850s frontier, the series follows two families battling for power, land, and justice in a world ruled by wealth and survival. With its intense story and strong cast, the show promises a gripping and emotional viewing experience. IMDb rating is yet to be announced.
title: Netflix’s Gritty Frontier Drama The Abandons to Begin Streaming Soon: All You Need to Know

description: After a stellar run at the box office, James Gunn's Superman is ready for its OTT release. Up until now, the film has only been available for rent online. However, the wait is finally over. Superman is finally gearing up for its digital debut in India. While the rights have been obtained by JioHotstar, the movie is expected to release in December 2025.
title: Superman OTT Release Date Announced: Everything You Need to Know About Clark Kent's Latest Adventure

description: Several reliable 5G options are now available under Rs. 10,000 in India, offering reliable performance, large displays and long battery life. Key models include the Samsung Galaxy M06 5G with a Dimensity 6300 chip, the Poco M7 5G and Redmi A4 5G with 120Hz displays, the Lava Bold N1 5G running Android 15 and the feature-packed Infinix Hot 60i 5G with a 6,000mAh battery. These phones deliver essential features, good connectivity and competitive pricing, making them ideal budget-friendly 5G choices.
title: Best 5G Smartphones Under Rs 10,000 in India: Samsung Galaxy M06 5G, Poco M7 5G, Redmi A4 5G and More

description: Airtel prepaid or postpaid subscribers who are wondering how to get access to your detailed call history, can download the Airtel Thanks app and send a brief message to the telecom operator. The telecom service provider's app is available for download on the Google Play Store for Android users and on Apple's App Store for iPhone owners. You will need to log in to the app from the same phone number for which you wish to check the call history. The company sends the document to your email ID, which can be downloaded onto your respective devices.
title: Check Airtel Call History Using Airtel Thanks App: A Step-By-Step Guide

description: The Google Pixel Watch is supposed to be Google’s shining example of a Wear OS-powered device. But it has faltered over the years through various iterations in some areas. This year, things are finally on track and Google seems to have checked all the boxes, making it an easy recommendation for those looking for a Wear OS-powered health and fitness tracker to be paired with an Android smartphone.
title: Google Pixel Watch 4 Review: Wear OS as It Should Be

description: PAN card applicants can easily check their PAN card status online using various methods. It can be tracked through the acknowledgement number, name and date of birth, Aadhaar number, or via SMS. Applicants can check the status through the NSDL and UTITSL websites. Here’s a quick guide on the different ways to track your PAN card status online.
title: How to Check PAN Card Status Online Using Aadhaar Number, Mobile Number, Name, Date of Birth

description: The Redmi 15C 5G has finally made its way to the Indian market. It arrives as the successor to the Redmi 14C 5G, priced at Rs. 12,499 for the base model. The phone has a simple, functional design that is entirely different from its predecessor. It’s a fairly large smartphone, and the size is noticeable the moment you pick it up. But how does the Redmi 15C 5G perform? Wait for our full review to find out.
title: Redmi 15C 5G First Impressions

description: SpaceX successfully launched 29 new Starlink satellites aboard a Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral on December 2, 2025. The satellites were deployed about 65 minutes after liftoff, pushing the operational constellation past 9,100 units. The Falcon 9’s first-stage booster also completed its 25th landing on the drone ship A Shortfall of Gravitas. The mission marks another step toward SpaceX’s goal of building a global broadband network.
title: SpaceX Adds 29 New Starlink Satellites in Successful Falcon 9 Launch

description: The Dyson HushJet Purifier Compact air purifier has been launched in India. It has a star-shaped HushJet Entrainment Nozzle and offers electrostatic filtration. It is said to capture 99.97 percent of particles as small as 0.3 microns. It has an LCD screen to show real-time indoor air quality and the concentration of particles being filtered. It can be controlled through the MyDyson app. Users can monitor indoor air quality in real time, set purification schedules and more through the app.
title: Dyson HushJet Purifier Compact Launched in India With Electrostatic Filter, AQI Indicator, New HushJet Nozzle Design

description: The Motorola Edge 70 could be launched in India soon, according to a tipster. The handset was introduced in select global markets in November as the successor to the Motorola Edge 60. A tipster suggests that its Indian counterpart could come with several differences compared to the global model, including a bigger battery and a “fresh” design. The Motorola Edge 70 is rumoured to be the Lenovo-owned company’s ultra-slim smartphone, inspired by the Moto X70 Air that made its China debut in October.
title: Motorola Edge 70 India Launch Date Leaked; Indian Variant Said to Feature Bigger Battery, Slim Design

description: AWS has introduced a new class of autonomous “frontier agents” aimed at software teams, including a coding assistant named Kiro, a security agent and a DevOps agent. Designed to pursue goals rather than single tasks, these agents can work independently, handle multi-step workflows and scale across complex projects. AWS says the technology could eventually expand beyond development to other enterprise functions.
title: AWS Unveils Frontier AI Agents for Enterprises, Can Operate for Days Without Intervention

description: The Government of India's Ministry of Communications announced on Wednesday that it is withdrawing the mandatory pre-installation of the Sanchar Saathi app. The ministry said that the popularity of the app is growing. Hence, the mandate is now rendered moot. The decision comes soon after a report suggested that Apple plans to push back against the new mandate, citing privacy and security concerns. While the app was earlier reported to be an unremovable one, the Union Minister of Communications, Jyotiraditya Scindia, recently clarified that users will be able to uninstall it from their phones.
title: Government Removes Sanchar Saathi Pre-Installation Mandate After Pushback

description: A leaked One UI 8.5 changelog indicates Samsung is preparing several new features for Galaxy devices, though details may change before the beta launches in December for select S25 models. The update is expected to add continuous AI image generation, expanded Bixby capabilities, improved Smart View and Auracast, stricter Quick Share controls, enhanced Lock screen tools, an updated Weather widget, new Clock features, upgraded Samsung Health insights, redesigned Battery settings, and multiple accessibility and productivity improvements across the system.
title: Samsung's One UI 8.5 Changelog Leak Hints at Imminent Beta Release

description: The UK has passed the landmark Property (Digital Assets etc) Act 2025 that formally recognises crypto as property, giving courts stronger authority over asset recovery, fraud cases, and commercial disputes. Industry bodies, including Bitcoin Policy UK and CryptoUK, have welcomed the development, calling it a key milestone for regulated digital asset growth. The move mirrors similar progress in India and positions the UK for more detailed crypto regulation in the coming years.
title: UK to Recognise Crypto as Property After Lawmakers Approve Landmark Bill

description: OnePlus Ace 6T has been launched in China. The new handset is the second model in the smartphone maker’s recently unveiled OnePlus Ace 6 series. It is backed by an 8,300mAh battery. The phone is powered by Qualcomm’s latest octa 3nm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, paired with the new Wind Chaser Gaming Kernel. It ships with IP66 + IP68 + IP69 + IP69K ratings for dust and water resistance. Moreover, the phone is equipped with a dual rear camera unit, featuring a 50-megapixel main sensor. It sports a 165Hz refresh rate display, too.
title: OnePlus Ace 6T Launched With 8,300mAh Battery, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC: Price, Specifications

description: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl launched on PC and Xbox Series S/X on November 20, 2024, after multiple delays and unfathomable hardships. The survival-horror FPS was in a rough state, plagued with technical issues, performance bottlenecks, and bugs. Exactly a year later, Stalker 2 arrives on PS5 alongside a 1.7 update that promises an overhauled experience.
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl PS5 Review – Immersive Improvements

description: Apple’s foldable iPhone is said to be moving closer to production, and a new report says the device has passed another major development milestone. The foldable iPhone has reportedly entered engineering verification and the pre-mass-production stage. Some suppliers have already begun stocking components and are prepared to ship parts once Apple gives the go-ahead. The report suggests that years of design experimentation are now giving way to practical execution, signalling that Apple’s first foldable handset is nearing a stage where final refinements remain.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone Reportedly at Pre-Production Stage, Might Feature Vapour Chamber Cooling

description: ChatGPT may soon integrate with Apple’s Health app, according to a report that found Health app imagery inside the chatbot’s latest iOS build. The discovery suggests ChatGPT could eventually analyse activity, sleep or diet data to answer health-related queries, though no implementation details are visible yet. Neither company has confirmed the feature, and concerns about sharing sensitive health data remain.
title: ChatGPT Could Soon Be Integrated With Apple Health App: Report

description: Google Photos has released the 2025 Recap. This annual review feature appears in both the Memories carousel and the Collections tab on the Google Photos app. It highlights moments from the year with cinematic effects and visuals. Google allow users to share the Recap via messaging apps and social media. Users can hide certain people or photos in their Recap.
title: Google Photos 2025 Recap Rolls Out With Your Most Memorable Photo and Video Moments

description: Google has released its latest Android 16 update, which brings various new features to Pixel phones. The new Android 16 QPR2 update will allow users to customise the shape of app icons on their home screen, choosing one of the five options. Moreover, the update introduces AI-generated notification summaries, which enable users to read text messages and group chat threads in brief. The Android 16 QPR2 update is currently being rolled out in phases to select Google Pixel phones.
title: Google Pixel Phones Get AI Notification Summaries, New Parental Controls With Android 16 QPR2 Update

description: Hitman: Absolution marks Feral Interactive’s second attempt at adapting Agent 47’s world to iOS, and it is not a half-measure by any means. It is a mobile port that still delivers that meticulous, cold, satisfying feeling of executing a plan to perfection that you only get from Hitman games. If you want a stealth game on iPhone that captures the feel of a proper Hitman release rather than a scaled-down mobile spinoff, this is the one to start with. Here’s our review.
title: Hitman: Absolution (iOS) Review: Agent 47 Makes a Cold, Calculated Return to Mobile

description: Sony ILCE-7V full-frame mirrorless camera was launched in India on Wednesday. Positioned as a hybrid solution for both photographers and video creators, the new camera features a newly developed partially stacked Exmor RS CMOS sensor with 33-megapixel resolution, along with Sony’s latest BIONZ XR2 image processor. As per the company, it combines upgraded hardware with the Alpha series’ AI processing unit to deliver improved autofocus speed, subject recognition, colour accuracy, and video performance.
title: Sony ILCE-7V Full-Frame Mirrorless Camera Launched in India With 33-Megapixel Exmor RS Sensor: Price, Specifications

description: Bitcoin surged above $93,000 (roughly Rs. 84.1 lakh) after a strong liquidity boost from the US Federal Reserve, and broader institutional access helped revive market momentum. Altcoins also advanced, with Solana, XRP, and BNB posting notable intraday gains. Analysts say easing macro uncertainty and expanding ETF participation are supporting short-term sentiment, though Bitcoin must hold key support levels to maintain its current structure.
title: Bitcoin Surges Above $93,000 as Liquidity Boost, Institutional Access Lift Market Confidence

description: Google has announced new Android features. It brings an update to the Phone by Google app that lets users mark a call as urgent. The Circle to Search feature lets users find potential fraud. Google now allow users to leave unwanted group chats in Google Messages. The Expressive Captions feature on Android will now display real-time captions. The update also includes new Emoji Kitchen sticker combos.
title: Circle to Search Update Adds Spam Detection; Google Brings Urgent Call Notes, New Emoji to Android

description: PhonePe’s Indus Appstore and Motorola India entered a partnership on Wednesday. Announcing the partnership, PhonePe highlighted that the Indus Appstore will now be available on all Motorola devices in the country. The move expands the Indian app marketplace’s footprint to more devices, allowing Android users to choose their preferred source to download and install apps.
title: Motorola Smartphones in India Now Support PhonePe's Indus Appstore

description: Nothing is set to launch the Phone 3a Community Edition on December 9, continuing the co-creation initiative first announced in March. The company claimed that this second edition received 700 entries and had a nine-month development cycle. Four winning creators were flown to London to develop designs across hardware, accessories, wallpapers, and marketing, each receiving a GBP 1,000 (roughly Rs. 1,19,600) reward. Last year’s Phone 2a Plus Community Edition was the company’s first community-built device.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Community Edition Launch Date Announced: Expected Specifications, Features

description: IDC projections suggest Apple may launch only three iPhone models in 2026, potentially delaying the base model and the next iPhone Air to 2027. The shift would break the four-model pattern Apple has followed since 2020. Reports also hint that one of the three releases could be the long-rumoured iPhone Fold. Shipments are expected to dip in 2026 before rebounding the following year.
title: Apple Might Launch Only Three iPhone Models in 2026, IDC Data Suggests

description: Binance has appointed co-founder Yi He as co-CEO alongside Richard Teng, marking a significant update to the exchange’s leadership structure. The move follows a period of regulatory transitions and comes amid renewed attention on Binance’s long-term direction. Yi He’s appointment builds on her central role in shaping the company’s culture, while Teng continues to lead on compliance and global expansion.
title: Binance Names Co-Founder Yi He as Co-CEO; Will Lead Firm Alongside Richard Teng

description: Google’s virtual try on feature, an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered tool that allows users to see how they would look in an outfit, is finally coming to India. The Mountain View-based tech giant announced the expansion of the feature on Wednesday, highlighting that the users in the country can now find a new “try it on” icon across Google.
title: Google Expands Its AI-Powered Virtual Apparel Try On Tool to India

description: Motorola Edge 70 Ultra renders have been leaked online, according to a report. The leaked images show the rumoured phone in blue and green colourways. The handset will reportedly sport a textured rear panel, too. Moreover, it appears with a triple rear camera unit, paired with an LED flash, housed inside a square camera island. On the front, the Motorola Edge 70 Ultra will reportedly sport a hole punch display cutout for the selfie camera. Powering the yet-to-be-confirmed handset could be Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Ultra Design, Triple Rear Camera Module Spotted in Leaked Renders

description: Poco C85 5G India launch date was announced by the Chinese smartphone maker on Wednesday. The handset is set to be unveiled in the country in the second week of December. It is confirmed to be equipped with a 6,000mAh battery with 33W wired fast charging support. It will also get a 50-megapixel primary rear AI camera, housed inside a square camera module. It will be available in India via Flipkart in at least a purple colourway. The phone was recently spotted on the Google Play Console, revealing its specifications.
title: Poco C85 5G India Launch Date Announced; Key Specifications, Features Confirmed

description: The Redmi 15C 5G was launched in India on Wednesday, following its debut in select global markets in September. It arrives as a budget handset and the successor to the Redmi 14C, which was introduced in January this year. The Redmi 15C 5G is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, coupled with up to 8GB of RAM and 128GB of onboard storage. The new handset from the Xiaomi subsidiary has a 50-megapixel dual rear camera system.
title: Redmi 15C 5G Launched in India With Dimensity 6300 Chip and 50-Megapixel AI Dual Camera: Price, Specifications

description: The Redmi Note 15 5G series is expected to be launched in India and the global markets, comprising three models — Redmi Note 15 5G, Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G, and Redmi Note 15 Pro+ 5G. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the price and specifications of all three models have been leaked by a tipster. The Redmi Note 15 5G is tipped to come with a 6.77-inch AMOLED screen, while the Pro and Pro+ variants may sport identical 6.83-inch CrystalRes AMOLED displays.
title: Redmi Note 15 5G Series Price, Specifications Tipped Ahead of Global Launch

description: ZTE’s Nubia brand has launched two foldables in Japan, the book-style Nubia Fold and the clamshell Nubia Flip 3. The Fold features an 8-inch 120Hz display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, dual 50-megapixel rear cameras, and a 6,560mAh battery. The Flip 3 will go on sale in January 2026 with a 6.9-inch 120Hz display, Dimensity 7400X chip, 50-megapixel main camera, and a 4,610mAh battery. Both run Android 15, offer 5G connectivity, and carry IP5X and IPX4 ratings.
title: Nubia Fold With 6,560mAh Battery, 8-Inch OLED Display Launched Alongside Nubia Flip 3: Price, Features

description: Samsung has officially teased the Exynos 2600 chipset through a YouTube video. The 30-second video describes the chipset as 'refined at the core', suggesting system-level upgrades. The new chipset is likely to be used in the Galaxy S26 series. The  Exynos 2600 chipset is likely to come with several AI features to compete with offerings from Qualcomm and Apple
title: Samsung Teases Exynos 2600 Chip Expected to Debut on Flagship Samsung Galaxy S26 Series

description: iPhone 16, which was unveiled globally in September 2024, recently witnessed a price cut in India when Cupertino-based Apple launched its iPhone 17. The phone was recently available during Black Friday sale events of multiple retail chains. Now, Croma is offering the iPhone 16 at a discounted price, allowing customers to save up to Rs. 6,900 on their purchase. Croma is offering instant discounts on credit cards of select banks, along with interest free EMI options of up to six months.
title: iPhone 16 Price Drops Under Rs. 63,000 on Croma With Bank Discounts: Specifications, Features

description: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold will be available in Korea starting December 12. The company has revealed the price of the phone in its domestic market. Based on this, the estimated price for the Galaxy Z TriFold could be around Rs. 2,44,000 in India. The new phone has a 10-inch main display and a 6.5-inch cover display. It is powered by a 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset, coupled with 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of onboard storage.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Pricing Revealed; Here's How Much It Might Cost in India and Other Markets

description: Apple reportedly plans to resist the directive issued by the Department of Telecommunications (DoT) for preloading of the Sanchar Saathi app on all smartphones sold in the country. According to a report, the Cupertino-based tech giant will not take a legal stand but convey its privacy and security concerns around the app to the government, marking a potential regulatory standoff. The development comes as the Centre moves to tighten digital identity and anti-fraud frameworks linked to mobile devices.
title: Apple to Reportedly Resist Government’s Directive to Preload Sanchar Saathi App: 5 Things to Know

description: YouTube has introduced its first year-end Recap for videos, offering users a 2025 viewing summary previously limited to YouTube Music. The feature generates up to 12 personalised cards showing top channels, topics, viewing trends and a personality type. Some users will also see music data, with deeper insights available in the Music app. Recap is rolling out globally this week across mobile and desktop for adult accounts. YouTube also shared 2025 trends alongside the 2025 Recap.
title: YouTube Recap 2025 Rolled Out With Personalised Cards, Video Viewing Insights

description: Red Dead Redemption is now available on Android and iOS devices, Rockstar Games announced on Tuesday. The critically acclaimed game, set in the sprawling, fictional expanses of the American West and Mexico, is based on the Wild West. As per the Take-Two Interactive-owned developer, it is also rolling out Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare, which is a standalone expansion pack of the original game. Additionally, both single-player experiences have been launched on the PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S/X, and Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Red Dead Redemption and Undead Nightmare DLC Now Available on Android and iOS

description: The Redmi 15C 5G is set to be launched in India today, December 3. It is expected to arrive as a budget handset and the successor to the Redmi 14C, which was introduced in January this year. In the days leading up to its launch, the Xiaomi subsidiary has revealed several details about the upcoming handset. The Redmi 15C 5G is confirmed to sport a 6.9-inch 120Hz display. It will ship with last year's Android 15-based Xiaomi HyperOS 2.
title: Redmi 15C 5G Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features and Specifications
